page.title: 11A DAY AT SCHOOL part1
page.content: My mother calls me at about 7.30 and if I am feeling well slept I am usually up and dressed in 15 minutes. For breakfast I usually eat some cereal with milk and then a slice of toast. I catch the bus at 8.15 and along with about forty or fifty others we have a twenty minute journey to school. It is not too noisy at this time, most of us are not yet awake. School begins at 9.00 with roll call in our form-teacher's room. At 9.15 we go to our first class. There are six classes per day, four before lunch and two after. I am in third year in a secondary school and we study 11 subjects each with a different teacher. Next year we begin our "O" level courses and I will have to select four subjects from about 15 to study.
